channel.title: [PI] 317 adding soul split 1/5 hp damage. got errors help!
channel.description:
Pi source 317
I made my smite soul split i just need it to heal now. heres my current code
[code]public void applySmite(int index, int damage) { if (!c.prayerActive[23]) return; if (damage <= 0) return; if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index]; c2.playerLevel[5] -= (int)(damage/4); if (c2.playerLevel[5] <= 0) { c2.playerLevel[5] = 0; c2.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } c2.getPA().refreshSkill(5); }[/code] What do i add now to make it heal?
i found this code. but i got errors any reason why?
[code]public void applySmite(int index, int damage) { if (!c.prayerActive[23] && !c.curseActive[18]) return; if (damage <= 0) return; if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index]; if(c.curseActive[18] && !c.prayerActive[23] && c.playerLevel[3] <= 99) { int ssheal = (int)(damage/5); if(c.playerLevel[3] + ssheal >= c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) { c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); } else { c.playerLevel[3] += ssheal; } c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } c2.playerLevel[5] -= (int)(damage/4); if (c2.playerLevel[5] <= 0) { c2.playerLevel[5] = 0; c2.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } c2.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } } [/code]
I tryed removing the curse part but still got errors.
here are my errors src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1713: cannot find symbol symbol : variable curseActive location: class server.model.players.Client if (!c.prayerActive[23] && !c.curseActive[18]) ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1719: cannot find symbol symbol : variable curseActive location: class server.model.players.Client if(c.curseActive[18] && !c.prayerActive[23] && c.playerL evel[3] <= 99) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
i didnt remove anything frmo the thing because i didnt want to mess it up

item.title: [PI] 317 adding soul split 1/5 hp damage. got errors help!
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

The second code. i got off google. i was trying to find a working code. and when i click soul split when in combat vs a player. i want it to smite them normally and take 1/5hp from them and make the gfx thing when hp is taken.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 adding soul split 1/5 hp damage. got errors help!
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

rofl , you just wrote several things that have no meaning at all ,
first , you want both a prayer and curse to be active at the same time?
and second , you didnt declare curses ; you have to add a curse config before you can use them as normal prayersâ€¦

Read full topic

@noobcoderh2o wrote:

Pi source
317

I made my smite soul split i just need it to heal now. heres my current code

public void applySmite(int index, int damage) { if (!c.prayerActive[23]) return; if (damage <= 0) return; if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index]; c2.playerLevel[5] -= (int)(damage/4); if (c2.playerLevel[5] <= 0) { c2.playerLevel[5] = 0; c2.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } c2.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } What do i add now to make it heal?

i found this code. but i got errors any reason why?

public void applySmite(int index, int damage) {                if (!c.prayerActive[23] && !c.curseActive[18])                        return;                if (damage <= 0)                        return;                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {                         Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];                        if(c.curseActive[18] && !c.prayerActive[23] && c.playerLevel[3] <= 99) {                                                int ssheal = (int)(damage/5);                                                if(c.playerLevel[3] + ssheal >= c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) {                                                        c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);                                                } else {                                                        c.playerLevel[3] += ssheal;                                                }                                                c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);                        }                        c2.playerLevel[5] -= (int)(damage/4);                        if (c2.playerLevel[5] <= 0) {                                c2.playerLevel[5] = 0;                                c2.getCombat().resetPrayers();                        }                        c2.getPA().refreshSkill(5);                }                }

I tryed removing the curse part but still got errors.

here are my errors src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1713: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable curseActive
